metadata.name: Motoma #1
metadata.description: In 'Defenders of the Land', Studio Chibli presents the story of Motama, a teenage girl and her faithful fox dog Polya, who live ordinary lives until they are called upon to defend their world against evil invaders known as the Outworlders. Alongside humans and lovable creatures, Motama and Polya become unlikely heroes in the fight for their home. With bravery, friendship, and a little bit of magic, they work together to defeat the invaders and save their land.
